reminderHealthy.title: Take a break
reminderHealthy.text: Step away from your screen every 1 hour. Short breaks reduce eye strain and improve focus.

reminderHealthy.title: Stay hydrated
reminderHealthy.text: Keep a bottle of water at your desk. Hydration supports concentration and overall well-being.

reminderHealthy.title: Simple stretching
reminderHealthy.text: A few minutes of stretching keeps muscles relaxed and helps prevent tension. Your body will thank you.
